ARABIC: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Let them produce a discourse like it if they are telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So let them bring a discourse like it, if they are truthful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (If they are truthful in this), then let them produce a discourse of similar splendour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Let them produce a discourse like it if they are true in their claim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So let them bring a single discourse like it, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Let them then produce a recitation like unto it if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then let them bring an announcement like it if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then let them bring a discourse like it, if they speak truly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then let them produce speech the like thereof, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Let them produce a scripture like it, if what they say is true.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Let them bring a discourse like thereUnto, if they say sooth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Let them bring a discourse like it, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Let them then produce a recital like unto it,- If (it be) they speak the truth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Let them then produce a recital like unto it (the Quran) if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Let them produce a phrase like it, if what they say is true!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So let them produce a discourse like it, if they are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:34] Then let them bring a, concocted, discourse like it, if they are truthful, in what they say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then let them produce speech the like thereof) let them produce a Qur'an like the Qur'an of Muhammad (pbuh) (if they are truthful) that Muhammad has invented the Qur'an:
